aside from a few gimmick stealth missions  not fun  each mission is a slow push across the map vs endless respawning  units you build up to supply cap push to next objective  rebuild and go next sometimes you cant make it to the next objective before all your ships are destroyed so it could take multiple resupplies to take a objective your resources unlimited so it comes down to how much time you want to spend per mission  me i gave up about halfway through the game

an underwhelming space rts ancient space does its best to make a slick presentation but is an utter let down on most fronts graphics are dodgy unit path finding is nonexistent and every map feels like the same bland asteroid arena voice actors make a fair impression and theres even some big names unfortunately the story doesnt stick and i was pretty clueless as to what or why i was doing stuff   not recommended
